info.title: Cloudpie API v1
info.description:
Welcome to the Cloudpie API documentation. Here, you'll find details about all the available API endpoints. To interact with the protected endpoints, you must provide an HTTP Bearer Token for authentication. 

**Getting Started with API Tokens:**
- Log in to the Cloudpie portal.
- Navigate to the left sidebar menu and select **API > API Tokens**.
- Use the **Create New Token** form to generate a personal API token.
- Include the generated token as a Bearer Token in the Authorization header of your HTTP requests.

CreateUsersRequest.title: CreateUsersRequest
CreateUsersRequest.description: Model for the create_users request, containing a list of users.

ModifyOrgUsersRolesRequest.title: ModifyOrgUsersRolesRequest
ModifyOrgUsersRolesRequest.description: Model for modifying organization roles for multiple users.

PasswordResetRequest.title: PasswordResetRequest
PasswordResetRequest.description: Model for requesting a password reset link.

new_password.title: New Password
new_password.description: The new password, at least 8 characters long.

PasswordResetSubmit.title: PasswordResetSubmit
PasswordResetSubmit.description: Model for submitting the new password via the reset link.

resolved_by.title: Resolved By
resolved_by.description: Username of the person resolving the alert

resolution_note.title: Resolution Note
resolution_note.description: Note explaining why the alert was resolved

state.title: State
state.description: The new state of the schedule

run_type.title: Run Type
run_type.description: Type of run. Must be either 'query' or 'benchmark'

git_repo.title: Git Repo
git_repo.description: Git repository containing the queries or benchmark configurations.

use_auto_benchmark.title: Use Auto Benchmark
use_auto_benchmark.description: Flag to use the latest benchmark for the cloud platform. Only applicable when run_type is 'benchmark'.

steampipe_version.title: Steampipe Version
steampipe_version.description: Version of Steampipe to use. Defaults to latest.

powerpipe_version.title: Powerpipe Version
powerpipe_version.description: Version of Powerpipe to use. Defaults to latest. Only applicable when run_type is 'benchmark'.

plugin_version.title: Plugin Version
plugin_version.description: Version of the cloud platform plugin to use. Defaults to latest.

tags.title: Tags
tags.description: Complete list of tags for the project

UserCreateData.title: UserCreateData
UserCreateData.description: Model for a single user's data for the create_users method.

UserRoleUpdateRequest.title: UserRoleUpdateRequest
UserRoleUpdateRequest.description: Model for a single user's role update request.
